data.title: I have Not had Sex With My Husband For 10 Months – Jamie Yeo
data.meta_description: Famewhore.....? By: Meena Current Way to announce your return to radio by declaring that you are sexually frustrated, and whilst you are at it, making a pass at your ex-husband. Jean Danker will be very pleased indeed. Local celebrity Jamie Yeo has been separated from Englishman Thorsten Nolte, her husband of four years, for the…
data.text:
Famewhore…..?

By: Meena Current

Way to announce your return to radio by declaring that you are sexually frustrated, and whilst you are at it, making a pass at your ex-husband. Jean Danker will be very pleased indeed.

Local celebrity Jamie Yeo has been separated from Englishman Thorsten Nolte, her husband of four years, for the past 10 months.

The former Growing Up actress, who last week announced that she would be returning to MediaCorp as a DJ with Gold90.5FM next month, dropped the bombshell in an interview with lifestyle magazine 8 Days.

The couple have a four-year-old daughter, Alysia, whom they now share custody of.

In the same interview, Yeo also issued an apology to ex-husband and fellow DJ Glenn Ong, who recently left MediaCorp to join hospitality consulting firm CIR VIS as a director, saying that their split in 2009 was her fault.

There is shameless and then there is shameless. What some people will do get that a little bit of attention.

Sheeesh!!
